name: Thomas A. Henzinger
content: Tom Henzinger: Home Page Thomas A. Henzinger Ph.D. Stanford University Dr.h.c. Fourier University, Grenoble Dr.h.c. Masaryk University, Brno Professor, ISTA (Institute of Science and Technology Austria) Chair, FORWIT (Austrian Council for Sciences, Technology, and Innovation) Member of the Scientific Council, ERC (European Research Council) Short bio; full CV Coordinates Mail: Am Campus 1, 3400 Klosterneuburg, Austria Email: my_three_initials@ist.ac.at Assistant: Ksenja.Harpprecht@ist.ac.at Honors NAS (National Academy of Sciences) Royal Society (Foreign Member; Robin Milner Award) Academia Europaea Leopoldina (German Academy of Sciences) OeAW (Austrian Academy of Sciences) American Academy of Arts and Sciences AAAS (Fellow) ACM (Fellow) IEEE (Fellow) EATCS (Fellow; EATCS Award) Teaching Fall 2024: Formalisms Every Computer Scientist Should Know Research Theory of software systems Team Publications DBLP database Google Scholar Funding ERC (Advanced Grants QUAREM and VAMOS) FWF (Wittgenstein Award; NFN RISE; SFB SPYCODE) Last updated in June 2024.
